title: Flindly the Dating App
subtitle: Where two peoples meet
name: Flindly
description: Flindly is a cross-platform dating application built with Flutter, designed for both Android and iOS. It delivers a sleek and modern experience while ensuring seamless performance through REST API integrations and efficient state management.

The app allows users to create personalized profiles, swipe-to-match, and chat with matches. Authentication is handled via OTP-based login and Google Sign-In/Sign-Up for secure and flexible onboarding.

Flindly includes engaging social features such as the ability to see who viewed your profile, track likes, and unlock premium insights through a subscription model. A dark theme mode enhances accessibility and provides a modern UI feel.
With a premium UI/UX design system, the application ensures smooth interactions and elevates the overall user experience.
highlights: Built with Flutter for Android & iOS
OTP authentication & Google login/signup
Swipe-to-match system with chat interface
Profile views and like tracking
Subscription system with premium insights
Dark theme mode
Premium UI/UX design

title: MaxFit - Event Management
subtitle: Salesforce Experience Cloud Platform
name: MaxFit
description: MaxFit is a Salesforce-based Event Management Platform built on Experience Cloud, providing end-to-end solutions for managing events, attendees, speakers, and organizers.
Developed custom LWC components to deliver responsive pages, interactive dashboards, and dynamic filters, while integrating APIs for accurate location verification.
Implemented Apex triggers, asynchronous Apex jobs, and an error log framework to improve debugging, system monitoring, and performance.
Configured a secure Salesforce environment with profiles, role-based access, and permissions, while building interactive reports and dashboards for real-time insights.
highlights: Salesforce Experience Cloud-based event management
Custom LWC components for UI/UX and dynamic pages
API integration for event location verification
Apex triggers, async Apex, and error logging
Reports and dashboards with filters for analytics
Role-based access control with profiles and permissions

title: io8.io Angular Project
subtitle: Business Website Builder Platform
name: io8.io
description: io8.io is a business website builder platform that allows users to create ready-to-use websites with just a few clicks and drag-and-drop functionality.
Contributed to the frontend development using Angular along with ClarityUI and Bootstrap framework, ensuring a responsive and modern user interface.
Developed dynamic tables with CRUD operations, enabling real-time data management and smooth user interactions.
Collaborated on dashboards, charts, and role-based authentication to enhance usability, accessibility, and business workflows.
highlights: Drag-and-drop website builder functionality
Frontend development with Angular, ClarityUI, and Bootstrap
Dynamic tables with CRUD operations
Interactive dashboards and charts
Role-based authentication and secure access control

title: Incident Management System
subtitle: For io8 Case Resolution
name: Incident Management
description: Designed and implemented an Incident Management System inspired by ServiceNow, focusing on seamless case resolution and IT service workflows.
Developed a modern and intuitive UI for creating, updating, and tracking incidents with priority levels, SLAs, and escalation workflows.
Built dashboards and reports for IT teams to monitor open cases, performance metrics, and resolution timelines in real-time.
Enhanced system reliability with automated workflows, role-based access control, and integration with external APIs for efficient case management.
highlights: ServiceNow-style user interface with responsive design
Incident creation, assignment, and SLA tracking
Custom dashboards and reporting features
Role-based authentication and security model
Integration with external APIs for real-time case updates
Automated workflows and escalation rules

title: AutoPart Portal
subtitle: Car Parts Management & Sales Automation
name: Auto Part Portal
description: Built an AutoPart Portal on Salesforce Sales Cloud to streamline lead management, opportunity tracking, and real-time stock integration for improved business efficiency.
Automated sales workflows including lead assignment, opportunity conversion, and customer follow-ups, reducing manual efforts and boosting productivity.
Developed custom dashboards and reports to provide real-time visibility into sales performance, stock availability, and revenue trends.
Leveraged Lightning Web Components (LWC), Apex triggers, and Salesforce security model with profile-level configurations to ensure scalability and secure access control.
highlights: Salesforce Sales Cloud-based AutoPart management system
Automated lead management and opportunity tracking
Real-time integration of stock details with sales workflows
Custom dashboards and reports for performance monitoring
Developed with LWC, Apex triggers, and async processes
Profile-based security model with role-based access
